1000  COPY     START  1000              
1000  FIRST    STL    RETADR

1003  CLOOP    JSUB   RDREC

1006    -      LDA    =C'EOF'

1009    -      COMP   ZERO

100c    -      JEQ    ENDFIL

100f    -      JSUB   WRREC

1012    -      J      CLOOP

1015  ENDFIL   LDA    EOF

1018    -      LTORG

101b    -      STA    BUFFER

101e    -      LDA    THREE

1021    -      STfA   LENGTH
